alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; North Itasca; North St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 1:19AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Itasca, eastern Koochiching and northern St. Louis Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 118 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Boundary Waters Canoe Area Wilderness, to near Nett Lake, to 7 miles southwest of Littlefork, moving south at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Boundary Waters Canoe Area Wilderness Near Trout Lake around 125 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Togo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for north central and northeastern Minnesota.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; North Itasca; North St. Louis
